title: Improve Retro Bowl game to more closely match the original game

requirements.text: Rewrite the RetroBowlGame component in frontend/src/components/games/RetroBowlGame.tsx to more faithfully replicate the look, feel, and mechanics of the original Retro Bowl mobile game. The field must use a top-down perspective with a bright green pitch, white yard lines, hash marks, and clearly marked end zones. Player sprites must be bold and blocky (retro pixel/chunky style) with distinct team colors for each side. The HUD bar at the top must display score (home vs. away), quarter, time remaining, down & distance, and current yard line. On offense, the player taps/clicks to select a receiver running an animated route (routes shown as dotted lines before the snap), then taps/clicks again to throw with a realistic leading-pass arc. If no throw is made in time the QB scrambles automatically. On run plays the ball carrier runs forward and the player steers left/right by clicking/tapping. AI defenders actively pursue the ball carrier and attempt tackles and interceptions. Full football rules must be enforced: 4 downs to gain 10 yards for a first down; touchdown (6 pts) + extra point attempt (1 pt); field goal option on 4th down (3 pts); safety (2 pts); punt option on 4th down; turnover on downs. The CPU team controls its own offense with AI QB decision-making (pass or run). A play-calling screen appears before each offensive play with Pass (2â€“3 visible route options) and Run (direction options) choices. Tackle/collision animations play when the ball carrier is brought down. A halftime screen appears between Q2 and Q3. A final score screen with win/loss result and a 'Play Again' button appears at game end. Use Chakra Petch or Exo 2 typography for all HUD and UI text, consistent with the site's neon theme.

quotes: Maked it more like the game

acceptanceCriteria: The field is rendered top-down with a bright green surface, white yard lines, hash marks, and labeled end zones.
Player sprites are bold/blocky retro-style with clearly different colors for each team.
The HUD bar shows score, quarter, time remaining, down & distance, and yard line at all times.
Before the snap, receiver routes are shown as dotted/dashed lines on the field.
Tapping/clicking a route selects a receiver; a second tap/click throws the ball with a leading-pass arc.
If the player does not throw in time, the QB automatically scrambles.
On run plays the player steers the ball carrier left/right via clicks/taps.
AI defenders chase the ball carrier and attempt tackles and interceptions.
First downs, touchdowns, extra points, field goals, safeties, punts, and turnovers on downs are all correctly implemented.
The CPU offense uses AI-controlled QB decisions on its possessions.
A play-calling screen with Pass and Run options appears before each player offensive play.
Tackle animations play when the ball carrier is brought down.
A halftime screen is displayed between Q2 and Q3.
A final score screen with win/loss result and 'Play Again' button appears at game end.
All HUD and UI text uses Chakra Petch or Exo 2 font.

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/hooks/ or frontend/src/components/ui.
Do not change the backend schema or Motoko actor.
Retro Bowl's routing in GamePage.tsx and seed entry in seedGames.ts must remain unchanged.
nonGoals: Adding new games or modifying any other game component.
Changing the platform theme, navigation, or footer.
